name: VistaProSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on the living room lights.”
”Alexa, set the bedroom lights to seventy-five percent.”
”Alexa, increase the kitchen lights brightness by twenty percent.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
VistaPro SmartHome seamlessly integrates with Amazon Alexa to offer voice-controlled management of your VistaPro lighting controllers. To use this skill, you need compatible VistaPro lighting controllers and an active Vista account. Here’s how to get started:

1. Ensure your Alexa device is connected to the internet.
2. Enable the VistaPro SmartHome skill in the Alexa app and link your Vista account to automatically sync your VistaPro controllers.
3. Once linked, simply use voice commands to turn lights on or off, adjust brightness, or set up custom lighting routines.
4. This skill is available for use on all Alexa-supported devices and requires that your Alexa account language is set to English, as the skill is provided in English.

Please note:
 - VistaPro SmartHome operates based on the geographical location settings of your device and may have functionality limitations if you are outside supported regions.
 - This skill does not imply sponsorship or endorsement by Amazon. It does not infringe on any third-party intellectual property rights and is an official product of VistaPro, developed for controlling VistaPro lighting products.

VistaPro SmartHome is designed to enhance your lighting control experience, offering convenience and customization through simple voice commands.
